extendedInfo.description: â â â 2013 OFFICIAL DSA preparation materials  â â â â In collaboration with Camrider: one of the country's Finest Rider Training Companies! â UK Motorcycle Theory Test uses the Latest Official DSA revision question data bank in an intuitive, powerful way and is one of the most flexible applications on the market. REVISE MULTIPLE TOPICS at the same time! CHOOSE how many times you want to see the questions already answered in previous sessions! IMPORTANT NOTICE: contains the Latest Official DSA revision question data bank complying with a new DSA regulations as of 23rd January 2012. The main features are: ********** â Regularly updated. 2013 ready! ********** ********** â Complete. Includes ALL Latest Official DSA Revision questions and answers as well as FULL Official DSA Knowledge And Understanding Information for each question. ********** ********** â Works offline. Get as much training as you need when you need it. ********** ********** â Realistic. Try your skills in the Mock Test as many times as you wish! ********** ********** â Advertisement free! ********** ********** â Flexible ********** - UK Motorcycle Theory Test intelligently takes into account which questions have been previously answered incorrectly! - Allows practice of any number of selected topics simultaneously - NO ANNOYING REPETITION: choose how many times you want to see the questions already answered in previous sessions - Choose the number of questions you want to answer during a practice test - Full statistics with the number of questions still to be answered on the front screen ********** â The Official DSA revision question database ********** Over 970 UP TO DATE questions from an Official DSA revision question database. ALL TOPICS included. ********** â Easy to use ********** - Intuitive standardized interface allows you to focus on your test - Revise each question after test completion - Useful hints to make your learning more efficient

reviews.title: Top marks
reviews.comment: Just did my theory today and got full marks. Definately worth the money over the lite version
reviews.author: Stephen Morritt

reviews.title: HTC one x
reviews.comment: Got the 99p version. Found it really helpful.
reviews.author: Matthew Bush

reviews.title: Passed first time
reviews.comment: Makes sure you don\'t miss any tricky questions.
reviews.author: Patrick Thomas

reviews.title: Good question bank.
reviews.comment: Good questions and decent interface. However, hazard test is separate app... Was led to believe in this.
reviews.author: David Somerville

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Looks a bit old fashioned but does what it offers
reviews.author: juan betancur

reviews.title: New biker
reviews.comment: Does what it says on the tin.
reviews.author: Kenny Clark

reviews.title: Tried many others but this app is The BEST!
reviews.author: Dig love love

reviews.title: Gb1897
reviews.comment: Fantastic app, easy to use and no bugs apparent. Hope I pass.
reviews.author: Grant Baugh

reviews.title: Best iv seen
reviews.comment: Should mix the questions up a bit more but other than that a top app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best so far
reviews.comment: Of the few theory test apps I\'ve looked at so far this one seems the best in terms of usability and options etc, the only one I\'ve not uninstalled anyway :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: Much, much better then Webrich app. I have all four; webrich motorcycle&car theory test a these two. Easier and faster go navigate and a lot options. Especcially; exclude correctly answered questions. Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: camel
reviews.comment: very good app worth the money
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful app
reviews.comment: Works well, good for spare moments to get in last minute theory practice! Sony Xperia S lt26i
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well made
reviews.comment: Thanks for the app. Cheap yet faultless. Well done.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Learning loads of new things with this app. Helps prepare for the theory test :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic app
reviews.comment: Certainly helped me pass my theory test! Nice easy app to use
